title: Karen Gillan looks elegant as she dons puff sleeves and a maxi skirt for Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic
text:
She's known for her roles in action packed films such as Jumanji and Guardians Of The Galaxy.

And on Saturday Scottish actress Karen Gillan embraced a calmer look, by donning a pastel pink two-piece outfit at the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic in LA.

Karen, 31, looked elegant in a square-neck cropped top with dramatic sleeves which she paired with a maxi skirt.

Elegant: Karen Gillan, 31, wowed in an elegant pink ensemble which showcased her toned figure at the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic in LA on Saturday

Karen's tight pink top showed off her slender figure and toned midriff, which was only highlighted further by a large white belt.

The former Doctor Who actress accessorised her look by wearing a small bag over her shoulder and a statement black hat which matched her pointy shoes.

In keeping with her feminine ensemble, Karen wore her auburn hair slightly wavy and let her locks fall delicately against her face.

Statement sleeve: The Scottish actress completed her look with black accessories including a black hat, small handbag and pair of pointed shoes

Glam: Karen added a touch of pink eyeshadow and blush lipstick while wearing her auburn hair wavy for the polo in LA

Karen opted for a simple makeup look for the polo event and added just a touch of pink eye-shadow as well as a blush lip colour.

The actress, who is set to star in the new Jumanji film, has previously spoken about how she had to shave off her hair in 2013 to play Nebula in Marvel movie Guardians Of The Galaxy.

Speaking of the drastic change, Karen told Screen Rant she didn't hesitate to shave her head for the exciting role in the action sci-fi film.

'Well I was told even before I auditioned that the actress who got this would have to shave her head, and I didn’t think I was gonna get it. So I was like, “Absolutely, I will shave my head! Sure,' she said.

Commitment: Karen shaved her head in 2013 for her role of Nebula in Marvel movie Guardians Of The Galaxy but didn't have to part with her locks for the more recent Avengers: Endgame

‘Then three screen tests later, it was “Oh God, this might actually happen.”

Adding: 'And then I got the part, and then I thought about it seriously and I was like “I absolutely want to shave my head for this.” Because I mean the opportunity is too good to pass up.’

When she revived her role in Avengers: Endgame, Karen did not have to part with her luscious locks again.

However she told the Daily Record she found being bald 'liberating' but did admit 'the only downside is that being bald and this tall led to a lot of people mistaking me for a man.'

Also seen at the star-studded polo event in LA on Friday were This Is Us co-stars Mandy Moore and Justin Hartley, along with his wife Chrishell Stause.

Big Bang Theory alum Kaley Cuoco was also spotted at the event and looked sophisticated in a grey plaid pantsuit and perky ponytail.

Pretty Woman star Julia Roberts, 51, opted for a black and white polka dot peplum top and trousers with white Oxfords selected by stylist Elizabeth Stewart.
description: Karen Gillan, 31, looked stylish in a pink ensemble on Friday. The Scottish actress accessorised her look for the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic in LA with a black hat, bag and pair of pointed laced shoes.
